column4: Gnome has an option to start a Guest session. Can't we trigger the same thing from gdm?
Not that I'm aware of.  I believe it needs somone else to be logged in (and last I heard, there were some other issues with the guest session anyway)
GIMP can import it if it's in RGB.  If it's CMYK, you might have to find some hoops to jump through
thanks. I was lucky that it was RGB.
